title: 3 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Colombo 04
details:
REF NO: AFS0197

3 Bedroom Apartment for Sale in Colombo 04

- Unfurnished
- 15 years old complex
- 3 Bedrooms
- 3 Bathrooms (2 attached)
- 1500 sqft
- Living and Dinning area
- Kitchen with pantry
- Central gas
- Apartment can be used as two separate entrances.

Location:

- 2 min to Royal College and Thurstan College
- 2 min to Colombo Racecourse ground
- 2 min to The Commons Coffeehouse, Mac Donalds, Cafe Kick Off, Tsing Tao, KFC, Agra, The Manchester etc.
- 2 min to Ladies College
- 3 min to Durdans Hospital

Price of the property - LKR 55 Million
Price is exclusive of legal fee and stamp duty fee


Inspections with prior appointments

Please call during business hours of 9:30 a.m. and 6.30 p.m on weekdays.
